items.summary: In `backend/main.mo`, restore `getCategoriesWithProducts(offset: Nat, limit: Nat)` to match the user-provided implementation exactly: (1) sort categories by `order` ascending, (2) paginate categories using `sliceToArray(offset, endIndex)`, (3) for each category, filter products by `categoryId`, (4) sort products with `isFeatured` first and then `lastUpdatedDate` descending with the same null-handling logic, and (5) return at most 5 products per category using `sliceToArray(0, min(sortedProducts.size(), 5))` while still returning `productCount = categoryProducts.size()`.
